item.title: ~Code Gone Wrong ,Adding in wrong place?~
item.dc:creator: @killer_2008 killer_2008
item.description:
@killer_2008 wrote:

Im having problems with my code, so when you use the andti dragon fire shield u wont get hit by kbd, if u dont u get hit high, it worked already but the effect its taking the effect in all the NPCs of my server , i dont want that to happen , i only want it on kbd, im i adding it in the wrong place? please help

} else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 50 && plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerShield] == 1540 || plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerShield] == 2774) { hitDiff = 3 + misc.random(7); gfxAll(442, EnemyY, EnemyX); plr.sendMessage("The shield Protects you from the dragon flames."); } else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 50 && plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerShield] != 1540 || plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerShield] != 2774) { hitDiff = 20 + misc.random(50); plr.sendMessage("You are burnt by the dragon flames."); gfxAll(396, EnemyY, EnemyX);

Read full topic
